description:
A large, open umbrella, as provides shade at a beach or patio. Generally depicted as a striped umbrella inserted into a patch of sand and tilted to the right.

Commonly used for various content concerning the beach, summer vacations (holidays), sunny weather, and relaxing outdoors.

The color of the stripes varies across platforms; Apple (no sand) and Samsung’s are red and yellow, while Google, Twitter and Facebook’s red and white, and WhatsApp’s rainbow-colored. Google’s was previously blue and white.

Not to be confused with other umbrella-related emoji, such as üèñÔ∏è Beach With Umbrella, though their applications may overlap.
apple_vendor_description: The "Umbrella on Ground" emoji on Apple devices is depicted as a gracefully fanned-out umbrella lying on its side, its canopy a vibrant, rich color that catches the light with Apple's signature glossy 3D shading. The handle and ribs are rendered with smooth gradients, giving the object a polished and tactile appearance, while soft rounded edges contribute to its friendly and approachable design. This emoji evokes a sense of protection, shelter, or perhaps a moment of unexpected downtime, its detailed rendering making it a visually appealing and symbolically versatile element in digital conversations on Apple devices.
